summary: Change directory to parent folder and run pytest with various options to execute test_project.py.

details.comment: Change directory to parent folder and run pytest with various options to execute test_project.py.
details.content:
# cd ..
# pytest --lf --lfnf=all --capture=tee-sys test_project.py
pytest --lf --lfnf=all --capture=tee-sys --log-level=DEBUG test_project.py
# no much difference.
# env BETTER_EXCEPTIONS=1 pytest --lf --lfnf=all --capture=tee-sys --log-level=DEBUG test_project.py
# pytest --lf --lfnf=all test_project.py
# pytest --lf --lfnf=all --capture=tee-sys test_project.py
